name: Bullet Upgrade Hell
description:
A bullet-hell like game with upgrades.

Battle against monsters to get gold for upgrades back at the shop.

The monsters get tougher and tougher the further out you venture.

Try and defeat enough enemies to be able to reach the boss battle on the outskirts of the playing area.

Be quick though! as the world will start to fall out from beneath you if you linger for too long in one area.

I'd love to hear any and all feedback down in the comments section :)

Music provided by Avaren
